channel.title: Need help making some commands for [pi]!
channel.description:
I really want to make some commands. 1 command I want is to spawn npc vertions of players.... like ::spawnplayer (username) then it creates an npc of that player and of what they look like ect. I know this is posable cuz iv seen it done...
another thing I need is bork attack animation code and death code if anyone has please and thanks to the people who help me get this information.
